title: Praise the Return of the Lord | Musical Drama "Every Nation Worships Almighty God" (English Dubbed)

json.text: It's wonderful! We can enter into the new age!
So, in other words, God has returned!
The incarnation talked of here is the Lord Jesus Christ!
Right, it's the Lord Jesus Christ.
It was clearly stated this is the second instance of God becoming flesh.
How could you not understand that?
This time God does His work not in a spiritual body.
It is a very ordinary one!
Oh! So that's how it is! That's right.
Isn't He just of ordinary flesh?
How can one say He's God?
Don't you guys agree? Am I right? (Easy. What's your rush?)
Brother, just settle down and listen, alright?
God always cares and shows mercy to us all.
If that's really so, we're truly blessed.
And so, His every word would seem to shake the heavens and earth,
further, if you see His eyes, they're blazing flames.
Were you just saying "the words He speaks"?
The words He says seem to shake the heavens and earth.
She sang "you cannot hear the words."
Are His words referring to God's?
God's words are a big deal! Not a small one!
True. God should have let us know.
Why would He let others know that first?
Because, well, it's a big deal.
Well, if you want to know God's words, His work,
then all you need to do is …
Goodness. Put that way, it's a little scary.
It would seem He's quite significant to us. (You're right. Yeah.)
Yes, stated that way, it is frightening.
Still, the Lord Jesus Christ has forgiven our sins.
Things like that, they won't befall any of us.
Those like us will not ever have to suffer through either famine or plague.
Also, we won't be destroyed, either and condemned in hell.
See, the Lord Jesus has already saved us all.
Brothers, we understand how you feel.
There's still more for us to talk about. (Yes.)
Sit for now. Let them talk.
This ordinary person could really be God become flesh.
What concerns me is God's words they were talking about.
Right, God's words. (Do you know anything about it?)
They talk and talk yet they still haven't told us.
That is an issue, isn't it?
We weren't told, they don't tell the answer.
Hey, then we should think of one, seek one out!
Yes, that's right. (Yes, we should find one.)
Hold on. Let's check the Bible.
We can find the answer in the Bible!
The Book of Isaiah, of course.
Yes, we can find it there.
There's no answer in the Book of Isaiah!
No. How could it not be?
This is odd. Which Book has it?
Honestly, we've looked so long and still nothing!
Wait. Why haven't you checked Revelation?
How could you have forgotten that one?
of God's words they talked of.
You've found God's words? You found it?
God's words, where could they be?
What the Lord Jesus said would all be God's words, no?
And the words Jehovah spoke are God's words as well.
It's hard to tell. (Yes, it is.)
Wait, wait. That was too far.
But the Lord Jesus never told us mankind's destination.
He hasn't told us the secrets that man is unable to tell us about.
Jehovah God hasn't told us the inscrutable truths, at least not yet.
Other than God, there's no one else who can tell us these things.
if there's one source who can tell us these things,
If you would, take a look!
The Word Appears in the Flesh?
Come on and open it. Let's just read it.
Isn't this a book about God's utterances?
We should just hurry up and read it. (Let's read further below.)
Look. (Words of the Holy Spirit to churches?)
In Your Faith in God You Should Obey God
What does that mean? What does it mean?
Oh, what else is in this?
I found it! I found it!
It's God's words! They're right here!
What's that? The fury of God?
Let's look into it more. Read on.
Oh, let me see. I want a look.
Have a look. It seems to be something in Revelation.
Brother, the tone of these words is harsh.
These words have the tone of the Lord Jesus'.
I think I've seen such words in the Four Gospels of the New Testament.
It sounds like God's words! Right?
You should try to be more patient.
Oh, let me see, let me see.
We have to read these words carefully.
Have you not found God's words?
Then are these words you see God's words or not?
Oh, I think they're all His words.
Is there now an answer in your heart?
If so, you're at ease now?
I should read more of this.
Have you ever seen this book? (Brother, I have a question about this.)
Hey, is it possible that this book came down from heaven?
Grandpa, how is this book connected to the Bible?
How can it be that easy?
When God speaks, we're unable to hear Him.
we'll have to go up to heaven?
Hey, we can't go up there. But God can come to earth.
Even if God came down to earth, we still couldn't hear Him or His words.
Come now. Sit down. Let us talk, please.
That's right, brothers. Come on over here, and let's talk about it.
If God's Spirit talked to us, we'd be unable to hear it.
What if He were clothed in flesh and talked to us?
why has God not become flesh yet?
we're all longing for that day and night,
longing for that day to come!
We are all long for God's return for so many years. (Yes.)
You should just look at this book.
Come on now. Just carefully take a look.
From the title, The Word Appears in the Flesh,
Just think, is its meaning not coming to you?
The Flesh. Then isn't that a human being?
Isn't God appearing in the flesh and uttering His words to us?
In other words, God has returned.
It turns out God returned long ago.
If He hadn't, who would've been able to express truths in here?
You should hurry up and read the words in this book!
We believe in God, following the Lamb's footsteps is what's crucial!
It's wonderful. Let's look some more.
If this is what God expressed in the flesh, is it everything?
God is like a living spring!
How can His words be expressed with these few?
Expressed with these few? (There are so many.)
The table of contents alone is 15 pages!
This is a few? So much.
This book here beats the Bible in thickness!
The contents of this particular book
only a portion of His expressions
Do you have a copy of The Word Appears in the Flesh?
Oh, I haven't gotten one yet.
The Word Appears in the Flesh.
I know. They lent me a copy of it last time.
They really speak to our hearts.
God's incarnation is beyond man's expectations.
Hey brother, share some more with us.
God appears to mankind and in the flesh.
Once here, He talks face to face.
Isn't this like seeing the Lord Jesus?
And thus, ended the age of fumbling through vagueness.
Look at us, what faith did we have before?
From now on, we can see God.
If we have questions, we can ask Him directly.
It's been hard to grope around in our faith all these years.
Each of us can listen to God's words with our own ears
and fully know His will for mankind.
Yes, we'll know His will for mankind.
at the same time we can know what His requirements for mankind are.
God has revealed His will to us.
How could it belong to you? It's God's grace!
He's believed in the Lord most his life. (Yeah.)
Living to see this is God's salvation.
God, He loves us so much!
He's come! It's a joyous occasion!
He has returned. We should all rejoice.
Right, it's a wonderful thing. Be happy!
The Word Appears in the Flesh.
It is God in the flesh,
He brings us the truth and the life!
In addition, it's God in the flesh
who points out to all the path to salvation.
That's right. The path to salvation!
Don't we believe in the Lord to be saved?
He has brought the path to salvation  to all!
Good job! Thank God for His love and mercy.
Brother, you have received the Lord!
God has always cared for every one of us!
God has heard them, all of our prayers!
we all, each of us have longed for His arrival!
At last, God has truly returned!
That's right! God truly has returned!
So what are we still waiting for?!
